top_comments.comment: 9:50 I think that they wanted the stream of casings coming up from the gun

comments_since_last_sample.body: I noticed on every single gun the bolt/slide locks back regardless of being empty or not, So there is no 1+ in the chamber, and you ALWAYS are forced to rack the bolt/slide on every reload. I hate games like that, so much, also the AR-15's 30 round P-Mag is also not only fitted incorrectly but also only holds 25 rounds.
Wait Jonathan the AA12 has chassis style construction unlike USAS12. and it's slow shooting to mitigate recoil but not in the way you think. It has a unique recoil reduction mechanism .
sad he didn't go over the Pheonix. was curious about his input on that one.
Excuse me mr ferguson, but the Doom 2 double barrel actually does have its buttstock
